I finally got it to work, this is what I did:

1. Go to your ARTIFICIAL GIRL 2 ISO+MDS folder, and rename the WinRAR file to "blah" or anything else you want(Since the .mds doesn't work)
2. Open the WinRAR file and extract it to the ARTIFICIAL GIRL 2 ISO+MDS folder.
3. Run the "ILLUSION ____2.mds" file in the ARTIFICIAL GIRL 2 ISO+MDS folder.
4. During installation, if you get an error, press the last option (3rd button) until it goes again.
5. Now go to your IMPORTANT PATCHES folder, and run "ag2fullpatchv2.exe".
6. Open the ReduxV10 WinRAR file and extract it to C:\Program Files\illusion\AI2 (or wherever your AI2 folder is).
7. Run "REDUX-INSTALLER.bat" in the AI2 folder.
8. Run "AG2.exe" and it should start the game.
Happy masterbaiting!
